entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
